## MetadataSelector interface

Metadata selector plugin interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MetadataSelector<TMetadata> extends GridPlugin 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [metadata](./grid.metadataselector.metadata.md) | <code>TMetadata</code> | Current metadata that are used for rendering |
|  [metadataChange](./grid.metadataselector.metadatachange.md) | <code>EventEmitter&lt;void&gt;</code> | Occurs when metadata changed |
|  [metadataGatherer](./grid.metadataselector.metadatagatherer.md) | <code>MetadataGatherer&lt;TMetadata&gt;</code> | Instance of metadata gatherer, which is used for getting initial metadata |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [show()](./grid.metadataselector.show.md) | Shows metadata selector |
